protocol.name: P-GSE44028-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil under long day condition (16 hours light and 8 hours dark). for 14 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE44028-4
protocol.text: total RNAs were extracted using RNeasy (QIAGEN)

protocol.name: P-GSE44028-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE44028-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE44028-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChipR Scanner 3000 7G system.

protocol.name: P-GSE44028-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with MSA5.0 using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 200.
